data.title: The Ultimate Veggie Cheeseburger & Tomato Relish
data.description: Get excited! Whether you’re meat-free on Mondays or all week long, our ultimate veggie cheeseburger will hit the spot! Teamed with tangy tomato relish and crunchy gem lettuce, trust us: this burger’s a banger!

ingredients.name: 40g cheddar cheese
ingredients.label: 40g cheddar cheese
ingredients.sub_ingredients: pasteurised cows milk, cream, salt, vegetarian rennet, lactic acid culture

ingredients.name: 15ml balsamic vinegar
ingredients.label: 1 balsamic vinegar sachet (15ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: wine vinegar, concentrated grape must, potassium metabisulphite (sulphites)

ingredients.name: 2 butter brioche buns
ingredients.label: 2 brioche rolls
ingredients.sub_ingredients: wheat flour (wheat flour, calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), egg, water, sugar, sustainable palm oil, butter (milk), egg white, yeast, salt, fermented wheat flour, flavouring, soya flour, emulsifier (mono- and di-acetyl tartaric acid esters of mono- and di-glycerides of fatty acids), colour (carotenes), flour treatment agent (ascorbic acid). May contain sesame.

ingredients.name: 2 ultimate vegan burger patties
ingredients.label: 2 Ultimate Vegan Burger patties
ingredients.sub_ingredients: rehydrated textured soya protein, water, rapeseed oil, onion, seasoning (sugar, yeast extract, sea salt, onion powder, potato starch, flavourings), sustainable palm oil, soya protein concentrate, chickpea flour, stabiliser: methyl cellulose; tomato purée, beetroot juice powder, sunflower oil, maltodextrin, garlic purée, salt, yeast extract, parsley, invert sugar syrup, black pepper, safflower concentrate.

data.title: Meat-Free Mince Thai Larb
data.description: For a tasty 10 minute delight, whip up this plant-based twist on Thai larb, flavoured with lime, mint and a hint of chilli. Once that's done, pile into crisp gem lettuce cups to serve. Delish!

ingredients.name: 15ml toasted sesame oil
ingredients.label: 15ml toasted sesame oil
ingredients.sub_ingredients: sesame seed (100%). Produced in a factory that handles nuts, peanuts, soya, mustard, celery and fish.

ingredients.name: 15ml soy sauce
ingredients.label: 15ml soy sauce
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, soya bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

ingredients.name: 15g ginger & garlic paste
ingredients.label: 1 ginger & garlic paste sachet (15g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Ginger and garlic puree (57%), sunflower oil, sugar, salt, water, acidity regulator (citric acid), firming agent (calcium chloride flakes), stabiliser (xanthan gum), preservative (potassium sorbate)

ingredients.name: 200g Meatless Farm mince
ingredients.label: 200g Meatless Farm mince
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Water, soya protein concentrate, soya protein isolate, rapeseed oil, pea protein, shea oil, coconut oil, chicory root fibre, thickener: methyl cellulose, caramelised carrot concentrate, carrot fibre, rice protein, vegetable and fruit extracts (beetroot, radish, tomato), yeast extracts, flavouring, carrot concentrate, emulsifier: soya lecithin, antioxidant: ascorbic acid, salt, vitamins and minerals (niacin, zinc, iron, B6, B2 (riboflavin), B1 (thiamin), B12)

data.title: 10-Min Spicy Chilli Paneer Noodles
data.description: For a speedy vegetarian delight, you'll stir-fry golden paneer, crisp vegetables and egg noodles in a punchy chilli and garlic sauce. To serve, sprinkle with crunchy peanuts and it's done!

ingredients.name: 25g roasted peanuts
ingredients.label: 1 bag of roasted peanuts (25g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: roasted peanut 96%, rapeseed oil. May contain sesame & nuts

ingredients.name: 8ml sriracha hot chilli sauce
ingredients.label: 2 sriracha hot chilli sauce sachets (16ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: chilli, sugar, garlic, salt, water, acidity regulator: acetic acid, citric acid, stabilizer: xanthan gum, preservative: potassium sorbate. May contain peanut

ingredients.name: 15ml soy sauce
ingredients.label: 1 soy sauce sachet (15ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, soya bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

ingredients.name: 226g paneer cheese
ingredients.label: 226g paneer cheese
ingredients.sub_ingredients: pasteurised whole cows milk, acetic acid, citric acid

ingredients.name: 2 medium egg noodle nests
ingredients.label: Medium egg noodles (2 nests)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: wheat (gluten) flour (calcium carbonate, iron, niacin, thiamin), pasteurised free range whole egg (5%), salt, colour (carotenes), firming agents: potassium carbonate, sodium carbonate, acidity regulator: citric acid.

ingredients.name: 10ml tomato ketchup
ingredients.label: 1 tomato ketchup sachet (10ml)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, tomato paste (24%), sugar, spirit vinegar, modified maize starch, salt, acidity regulator (citric acid), preservatives (sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate), spices, yeast extract, natural flavourings

ingredients.name: 15g ginger & garlic paste
ingredients.label: 1 ginger & garlic paste sachet (15g)
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Ginger and garlic puree (57%), sunflower oil, sugar, salt, water, acidity regulator (citric acid), firming agent (calcium chloride flakes), stabiliser (xanthan gum), preservative (potassium sorbate)

data.title: Pasta Alla Genovese
data.description: For this flavourful North Italian-inspired dish, you'll cook the pasta and potatoes in one pot to save washing up, and gently coat them in a homemade basil pesto to serve.

ingredients.name: 25g bag of cashew nuts
ingredients.label: 25g cashew nuts
ingredients.sub_ingredients: cashew (nut) 100%. May contain peanut, sesame & other nuts

ingredients.name: 20g pine nuts
ingredients.label: 20g pine nuts
ingredients.sub_ingredients: pine kernels (100%). May contain peanut, sesame & nuts

ingredients.name: 11g vegetable stock mix
ingredients.label: 11g vegetable stock mix
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Dried glucose syrup, yeast extracts, salt, sugar, onion powder, carrot juice powder, tomato powder, rapeseed oil, herb (lovage), natural flavouring

data.title: Nutty Three Veg Curry With Basmati Rice
data.description: An insanely delicious plant-based curry – ready in a hurry. You'll simmer vegetables and fragrant spices in a creamy coconut and peanut butter sauce, and serve with quick-cook rice.

ingredients.name: 15ml soy sauce
ingredients.label: 15ml soy sauce
ingredients.sub_ingredients: water, soya bean, wheat (gluten), salt, alcohol (ethanol)

ingredients.name: 26g smooth peanut butter
ingredients.label: 26g smooth peanut butter
ingredients.sub_ingredients: peanut, sea salt. May contain traces of other nuts

ingredients.name: 5g black sesame seed
ingredients.label: 5g black sesame seeds
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Whole hulled black sesame seeds (100%). Produced in a factory that handles nuts, soya, mustard, celery and fish.

ingredients.name: 40g Thai red curry paste
ingredients.label: 40g Thai red curry paste
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Garlic puree, red chilli puree (20%), white onion puree (10%), lemongrass puree (9%), rapeseed oil, galangal puree, salt, milled lime leaves, water, acidity regulator (citric acid), ground fennel, stabiliser (xanthan gum), natural flavouring (paprika extract), ground coriander, preservative (potassium sorbate)

data.title: Black Dal With Herby Kachumba And Naan
data.description: This creamy, luscious dal only takes 10 minutes to make. You'll serve it with a minty tomato, cucumber and coriander salad and fluffy naan for dipping.

images.title: Ten-Min Black Lentil Dal With Kachumba & Naan

ingredients.name: 1 tbsp curry powder
ingredients.label: 1 tbsp curry powder
ingredients.sub_ingredients: cumin seed, coriander seed, onion powder, turmeric, salt, granulated sugar, chilli powder, garlic powder, paprika,  cardamom, black pepper, ginger, fenugreek, cassia, bay leaves, cloves, natural flavouring

ingredients.name: 15ml white wine vinegar
ingredients.label: 15ml white wine vinegar
ingredients.sub_ingredients: white wine vinegar. May contain alcohol

ingredients.name: 250g cooked black beluga lentils
ingredients.label: 250g cooked black beluga lentils
ingredients.sub_ingredients: cooked Beluga lentils (97%) (water, Beluga lentils), Onions, Olive oil, Ground Bay Leaf.

ingredients.name: 15g roasted garlic paste
ingredients.label: 15g roasted garlic paste
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Oven roasted garlic puree (70%), sunflower oil, sugar, salt, acidity regulator (citric acid), stabiliser (xanthan gum), humectant (calcium chloride), preservative (potassium sorbate)

ingredients.name: 15g ginger paste
ingredients.label: 15g ginger paste
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Ginger puree (85%), sugar, acidity regulator (acetic acid), salt, rapeseed oil, stabiliser (xanthan gum), preservative (potassium sorbate)

ingredients.name: 80g coconut yoghurt
ingredients.label: 80g coconut yoghurt
ingredients.sub_ingredients: Coconut cream (89%), coconut water, stabiliser (tapioca starch), lactobacillus culture

ingredients.name: 2 garlic and coriander naan
ingredients.label: 2 garlic & coriander naans
